name: JasperReports Layout File
summary: Learn about .JRXML files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: JRXML files are compiled into .JASPER files, which may be used to create reports.

description: File used by JasperReports, a Java library used for creating reports programmatically; contains report design definition in XML format; includes design elements such as report layout, text fields, images, charts, parameters, and variables.
